statements: SELECT payment_id, policy_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE policy_id = 12345;
SELECT payment_id, policy_id FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE policy_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT payment_id, policy_id, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, payment_date DESC
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM PremiumPayments
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT policy_number, MAX(payment_amount) FROM PremiumPayments GROUP BY policy_number
SELECT renewal_date, renewal_amount FROM PolicyRenewals ORDER BY renewal_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_number, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT renewal_id, renewal_date FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_amount > 5000 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE policy_number = 1234 AND payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM PremiumPayments GROUP BY policy_number HAVING total_payments > 5000;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT policy_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, policy_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT policy_holder_name, renewal_date FROM PolicyRenewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, event_date, event_description FROM PolicyHistory WHERE event_description LIKE 'Policy Renewal%';
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, renewal_date FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_amount < 500;
SELECT p.policy_holder_name, h.event_date, h.event_description FROM PolicyRenewals p JOIN PolicyHistory h ON p.policy_id = h.policy_id;

SELECT p.policy_holder_name, r.renewal_amount, h.event_date, h.event_description FROM PolicyRenewals p JOIN PolicyHistory h ON p.policy_id = h.policy_id JOIN PremiumPayments r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id WHERE r.payment_amount > 2000 ORDER BY h.event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date FROM PolicyRenewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT insured_name, start_date, end_date FROM Policies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, insured_name, start_date, end_date FROM Policies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT count(*) AS total_payments, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, insured_name, count(*) AS total_renewals FROM Policies p INNER JOIN PolicyRenewals pr ON p.policy_id = pr.policy_id GROUP BY policy_number, insured_name;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.policy_number, pp.amount, pp.payment_date FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Policies p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id INNER JOIN PremiumPayments pp ON p.policy_id = pp.policy_id WHERE pp.payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM Policyholders ORDER BY policyholder_name DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policies WHERE policy_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT policy_type, COUNT(*) FROM Policies GROUP BY policy_type;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC, payment_amount ASC;
SELECT p.policyholder_name, pp.payment_amount FROM Policyholders p JOIN PolicyPayments pp ON p.policyholder_id = pp.policy_id;
